input.name: Enforce Branch Naming
input.description: Ensures all branch names follow the company convention

example.output:
# Branch Naming Policy

## Overview
This policy enforces consistent branch naming across all repositories, making it easier to track work and automate processes.

## Implementation Details
Branches must follow the pattern: `type/description-in-kebab-case` where type is one of:
- feature
- bugfix
- hotfix
- release

## Best Practices
- Keep descriptions short but meaningful
- Use lowercase letters and hyphens only
- Include ticket numbers when applicable
